name: Larry Calkins: Encaustic Art Necklace, Exquisite, with Artwork on Either Side of the Tabs
description:
Each tab of this bold encauastic necklace is painted and/or illustrated with a small found image and/or inscribed with some mysterious text. The style of this artwork is very typical for the encaustic paintings Larry Calkins has created for over 15 years. Here, the work is on a seemingly smaller scale.  (Visit www.calkinsart.net)

Each side of the individual tabs is a small piece of art and - like his paintings - they are parts of a series that are to be seen as elements of a congruous whole. In this unique piece, they are for once combined to create a Complete Statement.

The necklace has a faint scent of beeswax since that is what is used as encaustic medium. 

Dimensions of each tab: approx 1.75 x 1.75 inches
Length of necklace top to bottom (folded): 14.5 inches 
Weight: 6.5 ounces

Each metal tab attaches to the chain with a small handcrafted loop, close together, so they overlap and form a vibrant, dense layer. At each end there is a chain with a hook closure which allows for adjustable length.

The wire chain elements are coated with a clear sealer. Nonetheless, it is advisable to keep the necklace away from moisture.

Please contact us for additional images.

name: Red Hearts Necklace,statement necklace with rusted offbeat charm, by Larry Calkins
description:
Bold red hearts necklace with special offbeat charm, made to look old and worn. 
The hearts are hand shaped, cut from a sheet of metal, painted on both sides and then aged. 
Each metal heart attaches to the chain with a small handmade loop, close together, so they overlap and form a colorful, dense layer. 
There is a chain on either end of the necklace with a hook closure which allows for adjustment as is suitable.

Dimensions of each heart: approx 1.75 x 1.75 inches
Length of necklace top to bottom (folded): 18 inches
Weight: 5.5 ounces

The hearts and wire chain are coated with a clear sealer.

Visit calkinsart.net for a look at available paintings and sculpture.
Gallery representation in NYC, Seattle, Provincetown. MA and Chattanooga, TN

name: Rock Paper Scissors Necklace, by Seattle artiast Larry Calkins
description:
The artist recently found the scissors buried in the yard at his parents' home and instantly recognized them as the scissors that he used in grade school. 
He combine the scissors with a rock and some paper - the latter cut from an old children's book about a boy finding a pair of scissors. The cut-out paragraphs are attached to both sides of a piece of metal, aged and sealed under a coat of amber shellac. 

And ther you have it: Rock Paper Scissors 

Over time, the scissors have morphed into something surreal - they got bent and time as eaten away at the metal. Of course, that just adds to their mystique!

The ends of the blades have been dulled with brass dots but the curve of the handle makes one of the blades angle out when it hanging vertically. This might be a bit of a hazard, so wear it with caution.

The rock and "paper" pendants each attach with loops to one of the scissors' handles and hang freely. The chain itself attaches to the other handle and closes with an eye and a hook. Any of the loops can be used to adjust for a custom fit. All parts of the chain are handmade by the artist.

Specs:
Pendant: 8" long, from the top of the handle to the bottom edge of the metal pendant. The handle sticks out 1.75 inches at a 90 degree angle where it is bent.
Length of necklace top to bottom: 22 inches when folded 
Weight: 2.8 ounces

The pendants are coated with a clear sealer which makes the metal soft to the touch. We advise to keep the necklace away from moisture.

Please visit www.calkinsart.net

name: Copper Box Pendant on Hand Wrought Rope Necklace with Mysterious Photo of Woman
description:
The double pendant - with one hanging freely below the other - hangs on a handmade rope covered with a clear beeswax coating. 
The top pendant is made of thick copper plate and treated to look old, rough and worn. 
The lower pendant is a shallow rusted steel frame that holds a mysterious black and white vintage photo of a woman -- obscured by a clear, thick layer of wax.

The double pendant is connected to the rope with 2 good sized steel rings that allow the pendants to move freely - each one individually. The rope itself is quite stiff, closing securely with an eye and hook.

Dimensions: 
Copper Box: 4.5" long, 1.25" wide, 3/4 inch deep; 
Lower Steel Pendant: 1.25 x 1 x 1/8 inch
Length of the necklace from top to bottom: 15.5 inches
Weight: 3.5 ounces

The pendant is coated with a clear sealer, which also makes it soft to the touch.

name: Copper Boat Pendant on a Steel Chain Necklace by Larry Calkins
description:
This boat pendant is an actual 3 dimensional shape with a cabin and smoke stack. The material used is copper and it is hollow. 
Small round loops make up the chain close to pendant, while larger, oval loops continue on towards the eye and hook closure. Rust and the darkened color of the copper is left on the surface to give it that rustic, aged look.

Pendant: 2.75" long, 2 inches tall, 3/4 inch wide
Length top to bottom: 14.5 inches
Weight: 2.5 ounces

The chain and pendant are coated with a clear sealer.
